text:
the workflow schema file webapp/lenya/resources/entities/workflow.xsd should be
moved to the workflow module. this will require changes to custom publications.

while we're at it, it would be nice to port it to rng. it's the only xml schema
we have, and i don't see why our users and contributors should be forced to
learn two schema languages for lenya. looks quite trivial.
creator: nettings@apache.org
